input.title: Through The Breach Penny Dreadful: Bayou Games
input.bullet_points:
A simple mission to recover a stolen device turns into something more as the Fated get pulled into a competition between rival Gremlin families in a sprawling Bayou Bash.
So load your shotgun, grab your best pig, and try to avoid catching fire as you compete in one of the most grueling contests seen in the Bayou since the last time this sort of thing happened!
The Bayou Games is a fun four-session, Gremlin-focused adventure for the Through the Breach roleplaying game.
It requires the CORE RULES to play and is a good companion adventure for the Into the Bayou expansion.
input.description:
Winning means fame and fortune.

Losing means... well, it probably means that you were too drunk and fell off your giant chicken during the jousting competition.

A simple mission to recover a stolen device turns into something more as the Fated get pulled into a competition between rival Gremlin families in a sprawling Bayou Bash. So load your shotgun, grab your best pig, and try to avoid catching fire as you compete in one of the most grueling contests seen in the Bayou since the last time this sort of thing happened!

The Bayou Games is a fun four-session, Gremlin-focused adventure for the Through the Breach roleplaying game. It requires the CORE RULES to play and is a good companion adventure for the Into the Bayou expansion.

input.primary_use: historical simulation of World War I battles
input.title: GMT Games 1918-1919: Storm in The West, Black, 2013
input.description:
In 1992, Ted S. Raicer published his first design in the late lamented Command Magazine, 1918: Storm in the West, covering the last nine months of WWI on the Western Front. The game was an immediate success, earning a Charles S. Roberts Award nomination, and leading to the design of a Plan 1919 variant which assumed a German defensive strategy in 1918 and an all-out Allied assault to win the war the following year. GMT is pleased to offer a new boxed version of these classic Great War designs, with new artwork, and including an additional 1918 Allied Offensive scenario published later in Command.

This new GMT boxed version of 1918/19: Storm in the West is a two-player system that also works fine for solo play. Units are mostly corps (divisions for the USA, whose oversized units were nearly the size of Allied corps), and include infantry, tanks, cavalry and air support. The Germans start the 1918 campaign with large numbers of Stosstruppen, trained to overcome the trench stalemate of the previous three years. This gives the German player a strong offensive capability in the first half of the game. But these “shock troops” are a wasting asset, and if the Allies survive the initial blows, growing numbers of US troops and Allied tanks will see the Germans forced into a desperate defense in the game's second half.

In the Plan 1919 campaign, the Germans are assumed to have used the collapse of Russia to stabilize the Balkan and Italian fronts, forgoing the historical 1918 Kaiser's Battles in the West. The Allies are thus faced with a strong German defense, but with a fully mobilized American army and backed by masses of tanks and planes. This hypothetical campaign challenges the Allies to leverage these arms into the world's first blitzkrieg, while the Germans fight to force a stalemate that will leave them dominant in Europe.

The large-hex map, scaled at 8 miles to the hex, covers the active area of the Western Front, from Epinal in the

input.title: Transamerica Game
input.bullet_points:
Ages: 8+
Number of Players: 2-6
Item package dimension : 6.8inches L x 27.0 W x 27.2" H
Made in USA
input.description:
Product Description

America in the 19th century: railroads are booming! Pioneer spirit and vision are everywhere. Everyone wants to be the first to build a railroad network across the country. Each player has five cities and tries to connect them with a shared network of tracks. As soon as a player has done this, the round ends. The other players lose points. At the end of the game, the player who has the most points left is the winner. Who will be the first to connect his cities' Is it Casey, who was the first to build through the mountains to the west' Or Annie, who was the one who best made use of the others' tracks' The game is for 2 to 6 players and takes about 30 minutes to play. The author of the game is Franz-Benno Delonge.

From the Manufacturer

America in the 19th century: railroads are booming. Pioneer spirit and vision are everywhere. Everyone wants to be the first to build a railroad network across the country. Each player has five cities and tries to connect them with a shared network of tracks. As soon as a player has done this, the round ends. The other players lose points. At the end of the game, the player who has the most points left is the winner. A very simple railway game. The player who can make the best use of the other players' networks is generally victorious.

input.title: Shadows of Brimstone: Frontier Town Expansion
input.bullet_points:
Towns on the Old West frontier are full of danger and adventure around every corner!
Expansion for Base-game
Ages 12+
Playing Time: 90-180 minutes
Number of Players: 1-4
input.description: FFP0706 Frontier Town Shadows Of Brimstone Expansion Flying Frog Production The Expanded Town SG adds a Board for the Town experience between adventures. This board has the locations you can visit on it as well as full grid areas for the main street and cross street. This can be used for events in Town such as have a duel in the streets, robbing the bank (if you?re an Outlaw or Bandido type), or fending off full on creatures attacks on the town while you?re visiting there! The expanded town content includes 3 town layout mats. Small, normal and boom town. The mats contained empty building structures and some tokens that were drawn randomly and placed on the building slots. Some of the new buildings are Smugglers Den (no law allowed), Sheriffs Office (no outlaw allowed) and Street Market (counts as a little of everything, can sell dark stone, gamble, general store). Since the buildings are random, the camp location will now contain limited versions of any crucial buildings that were missing like docs office, church and saloon. Players: 1 to 6 Playing time: 120 minutes Ages: 12 and up

【THE SPILL-PROOF PARTY SAVER】 Tired of ruined games from drink spills? Our premium, washable fabric game mat wipes clean in seconds, solving the #1 party foul. Perfect for rowdy college parties, it's a must-have for adults who want worry-free fun.
【80+ HILARIOUS CHALLENGES】 Beat boring games with 80+ unique spaces like "Never Have I Ever" and wild dares. This solves repetitive gameplay by guaranteeing fresh laughs every time. Ideal for game nights, it's designed for party hosts who crave non-stop entertainment.

input.primary_use: modular battle grid for tabletop games
input.title: Dry Erase Dungeon Tiles, Shapes, and Sizes Earthtone Nine 10" Squares
input.bullet_points:
Double-sided Erasable Surface compatible with dry-erase, wet-erase, or liquid chalk. Even permanent marker can be erased with a little more effort.
Improved tab/slot interlocking design reduces wear and improves durability. Each piece is 10" square with 1" grid, compatible with same design 5" tiles.
Constructed of high-density chipboard approx. 1/8" (3.8mm) thick. Set of 9 tiles weighs over 3 pounds.
input.description:
Each full box of Role 4 Initiative Dungeon Tiles contains about 900 square inches of battle grid that interlocks like puzzle pieces.

Compatible with both dry-erase and wet-erase markers, and liquid chalk markers can be used as well.
More flexible than a traditional battle mat, start your game with a single tile and connect the tiles as the adventurers explore new areas.
Never again give away clues as to which way the corridors may lead due to starting placement on a large mat.
Available in 5" squares, 10" squares, or 6" hexagons; the modularity allows the Dungeon Master to draw many details of an area at his seat and then simply hand the tile to the nearest player to connect.
Take advantage of the double-side feature by pre-drawing map features before the game and only revealing tiles as they are encountered. You can draw one side as it appears naturally, and the other side that shows all the hidden traps and magic features when they are triggered.

input.title: Van Ryder Games - Horror Board Game - Final Girl - Into The Void - Feature Film Box - Core Box Required - 1 Player - 20-60 Min Gameplay - Ages 14+
input.bullet_points:
IMPORTANT REQUIREMENT: Into the Void is a Feature Film Box and cannot be played alone. You must also own the Final Girl Core Box (sold separately) to enjoy this chilling solo board game experience. Don’t forget to grab the Core Box to start playing!
IMMERSIVE HORROR EXPERIENCE: Step aboard the USCSS KONRAD and face the terrifying Evomorph. This advanced enemy evolves throughout the game, disappearing into the ship’s ventilation shafts, only to reappear when least expected. Survive the deadly hunt and outsmart the morphing monster.
UNOQUE FEATURES: Navigate through the KONRAD spaceship with new "keycard" mechanics to unlock critical areas. Will you fight the killer head-on, set an ambush, or escape via airlock? The choice is yours in this strategic, suspense-filled solo board game.
STUNNING ARTWORK: Each Feature Film box features beautifully illustrated covers on both the front and back. The box flips over to reveal the Killer and Location boards, enhancing your immersion into the game’s eerie world with vivid, atmospheric designs.
INNOVATIVE DESIGN: Into the Void box features magnetically attached covers that are removable. The reverse side of the cover becomes the Killer and Location boards, offering an engaging and organized design that adds to the overall experience.

input.title: Dollars to Donuts Board Game | 30-45 Minute | 1-4 Players
input.bullet_points:
FAMILY-FRIENDLY FUN: Easy to learn, this donut-themed game is perfect for players of all skill levels, from beginners to seasoned board game enthusiasts.
STRATEGIC GAMEPLAY WITH ENDLESS POSSIBILITIES: Combine the fun of dominos with complex pattern matching. Plenty of choices and unique strategies in every turn. You can even play tiles so they’re partially off your player mat!
MULTIPLE SCORING OPPORTUNITIES: Gain points by matching donuts, serving customers, completing sets, and pairing donut holes—while making sure to fill your player mat to avoid penalties!
CHALLENGING SOLO MODES: Compete against phantom players or race against time to satisfy picky customers in multiple solo game variations that keep you on your toes.
FROM ACCLAIMED DESIGNERS: Brought to you by the creators of Point Salad and Truffle Shuffle, this game guarantees hours of engaging, sweet entrepreneurial fun.

The City of Gloomhaven can be a tough place to make it as an adventurer and being in the right party is key to survival. The Jaws of the Lion are the top of the mountain in the hierarchy of the city, but their latest job goes sideways, and Anaphi, the mindthief, is to blame! The first comic from the wildly popular GLOOMHAVEN game launches a fantasy world unlike any in existence. Get ready for Quatryll punk bands, drug dealing Inox street gangs, and a dark God sleeping beneath the surface, eager to destroy the world. Welcome to the City!

One-shot intro to a detailed Gloomhaven story

input.bullet_points: <li>With 4 fearsome new Villains to hunt like The Ghost Ship Siren or the dreaded Dreamweaver the Heroes must fend off deadly curses and contend with all manner of creatures from the dark depths to keep evil at bay forcing it back into the icy waters that break along the rocky shores of The Coast.
input.description:
FFP0205 The Coast Expansion: A Touch of Evil

By Flying Frog Productions LLC

The Coast Expansion is packed full of new material for A Touch of Evil including 4 exciting new Heroes (such as Maria De La Rosa the Smuggler and the renowned monster hunter Argot Blackwell) a new full size game board of the fog-shrouded coastline to add to the main Shadowbrook board 3 new Town Elders and a host of new mysteries to be solved. The Coast also features tons of new game cards including decks for three new Locations to explore - The Smugglers Cove Lighthouse and the haunted Shipwreck as well as a new town - the long cursed village of Tidewater; and much more! With 4 fearsome new Villains to hunt like The Ghost Ship Siren or the dreaded Dreamweaver the Heroes must fend off deadly curses and contend with all manner of creatures from the dark depths to keep evil at bay forcing it back into the icy waters that break along the rocky shores of The Coast.

input.title: Lucky Duck Games Kingdom Rush: Rift in Time Board Game - Defend The Kingdom, Rewrite History! Cooperative Medieval Strategy Game for Kids and Adults, Ages 12+, 1-4 Players, 60-90 Min Playtime
input.bullet_points:
EPIC STRATEGIC BATTLES: Experience the beloved tower defense video game in a new dimension as you lead heroes, build towers, and fend off hordes of enemies in thrilling tabletop battles.
TIME-TRAVELING ADVENTURE: Embark on a daring quest through time and space to stop the evil Time Mage from tearing apart the kingdom's past, present, and future.
COOPERATIVE GAMEPLAY: Team up with friends in this cooperative board game to strategize, coordinate, and deploy powerful abilities, unleashing devastating combos to overcome the forces of darkness.
HEROIC CHARACTER PROGRESSION: Choose from unique heroes, each with their own special abilities and upgrade paths, allowing you to customize your playstyle and grow in power as you progress.
HIGH-QUALITY COMPONENTS: Immerse yourself in the rich world of Kingdom Rush with stunning artwork, detailed miniatures, and high-quality components that bring the adventure to life.
input.description:
Product Description

In Kingdom Rush: Rift in Time, you and your allies must work together to fend off the furious onslaught of the mysterious Time Mage. Command Heroes and build Towers to defend the realm by placing polyomino pieces to attack your enemies and deploying soldiers to hold back the ever-advancing horde. Be careful, though! The Time Mage’s portals are wreaking havoc, causing all of the Towers to warp in and out of existence! Will you play your Towers to defend the Kingdom, or will you pass them to your compatriots so that the Towers can be upgraded? The decision is yours!

Set Contains:

18 Path Tiles, 5 Hero Boards, 1 Wildcat Miniature, 5 Hero Minatures, 5 Hero Cards, 6 Spell Tiles, 20 Hero Special ability tiles, 4 Helper Cards, 44 Tower Cards, 18 Building Site Cards, 91 Horde and Portal Cards, 3 Boss Reference Cards, 16 Portal Storm Cards, 3 Boss Minatures, 4 Pathbreaker Cards, 12 Horde Trays, 18 Heart Tokens, 176 Damage Tiles, 4 PLayer Colour Markers, 6 Spawn Tokens, 1 Kingdom Map, 1 Rulebook, 12 Soldier Meeples, 3 Sheets of Kingdom Stickers, 1 Scenario Booklet

input.title: Learning Resources Engineering & Design Castle Set, STEM, Critical Thinking, Problem Solving, and Early Engineering Skills Toy, 123 Pieces, Ages 5+
input.bullet_points:
DESIGN, build, and redesign multiple castle creations with this 123-piece building set!
LEARN STEM skills fit for kings and queens with 10 engineering and design challenge cards!
EXPLORE the castles' interactive features - drop the drawbridge, build a working catapult, and more!
ADVENTURE with two knight figures and a trusty horse ready for fantasy quests!
AGES 5+
input.description: Let the challenges begin! Kids develop STEM skills fit for kings and queens every time they build with the Engineering & Design: Castle set from Learning Resources. This 123-piece STEM building set's easy-to-handle pieces support multiple build-it-yourself castle designs - kids can add a bridge, stack up a tall turret, or design an open courtyard as they bring their creations to life! The Engineering & Design: Castle building set also comes with a set of 10 double-sided Activity Cards filled with interactive challenges designed to boost critical thinking, problem solving, and early engineering skills - can you lower the drawbridge, build a working catapult, or trigger the surprise trapdoor? In addition to building and rebuilding the castles of their dreams, kids can also go on imaginative adventures with the help of this engineering set's two included knight figures and a trusty horse that's ready to set off on any fantasy quest your kids can dream up.

input.description:
Amazon.com

Children make creative melodies while building cognitive skill when they play with Music Blocks from Neurosmith. Each side of these five blocks plays a different phrase of music, chosen from three musical themes. This variety of phrasings allows children to compose many different sound combinations and patterns. As they enjoy their time creating, children develop lifelong cognitive skills. Music Blocks At a Glance: Five multicolored blocks for children to play their own musical creations Each side of each block plays a different phrase Three musical styles: Jumpin' Jive Jazz, African Rhythms, and Mozart's Night Music Musical patterns positively affect the way your child's brain develops Lay the groundwork for a lifetime of learning and creativity Age/Weight Requirements:

Four AA batteries Five multi-colored blocks play eclectic musical phrases. View larger. Stimulate cognitive development when arranging blocks and developing
play patterns. View larger. Create Unique Melodies with Five Multicolored Blocks
Neurosmith Music Blocks feature five multicolored blocks for children to play with and use to shape their own musical creations. The blocks fit into their display in a row and are held securely in place with magnets. When children press down on the blocks, each block will play a phrase of music. Each side of each block plays a different phrase, and children are encouraged to turn the blocks both to hear different phrasings and to see the different visual shapes on every side. Play Phrasings in Three Different Styles
Once they've decided which musical phrasing they like for each block, children can press the red button on the front of the display, and the blocks will play one after another from left to right to showcase the new composition. Children can follow along as each block lights up while it plays, and rearrange for new creations.
In addition, a switch on the back of the display allows children to play the blocks in three different musical styles: Jumpin' Jive Jazz, African Rhythms, and Mozart's Night Music. These styles provide a range of rhythms and melodies to inspire a child's creativity. Develop Play Patterns to Shape Cognitive Development
As children arrange and rearrange the blocks to make compositions, they develop a series of playtime actions called "play patterns." Research indicates that these patterns can positively affect the way your child's brain develops by stimulating and developing important connections through sound and visuals. By encouraging these connections, Neurosmith Music Blocks lay the groundwork for a lifetime of learning and creativity. What's in the Box
Neurosmith Music Blocks and instructions for use.

Product Description

"When it comes to "building" musical creativity, nothing tops Neurosmith's Music Blocks! The premise is simply brilliant: as toddlers rearrange the electronic blocks, they're composing beautiful, original songs. Each block side plays a unique measure of music, yielding more than one million possible tunes. This irresistible music toy sparks endless exploration, while teaching colors, shapes, sequence, and cause and effect. Music Blocks includes jazz, African rhythms, and Mozart selections; there are no additional cartridges to purchase. Batteries included. For ages 2 and up. Winner of the Oppenheim Best Toy Award A great introduction to the rudiments of melody and tone, as well as the sheer joy of creating music! Musical toys make great holiday toys that offer developmental benefits. Delivers great digital sound quality Music Blocks console measures 12 1/2"L x 7 1/2"W x 4"H; each music block is a 1 1/2" cube Requires 4 "AA" batteries, included Children make creative melodies while building cognitive skill when they play with Music Blocks from Neurosmith. Each side of these five blocks plays a different phrase of music, chosen from three musical themes. This variety of phrasings allows children to compose many different sound combinations and patterns. As they enjoy their time creating, children develop lifelong cognitive skills. Music Blocks At a Glance: Five multicolored blocks for children to play their own musical creations Each side of each block plays a different phrase Three musical styles: Jumpin' Jive Jazz, African Rhythms, and Mozart's Night Music Musical patterns positively affect the way your child's brain develops Lay the groundwork for a lifetime of learning and creativity Age/Weight Requirements: Two years and up Assembly Requirements: Four AA batteries Five multi-colored blocks play eclectic musical phrases. input.title: Primary Concepts PC-1042 Sound Sorting with Objects, Word Families
input.bullet_points:
Made in United States
Easy to Use
Manufactured by Primary Concepts, Inc
Package Dimensions: 15.25" L x 2.25" W x 11.38" H
input.description: Build phonemic awareness skills and letter/sound recognition with these ready-to-go sound sorting object kits. The wide variety of irresistible objects will actively engage young students in discriminating among similar sounds, and in connecting those sounds to the letters that represent them. Target sounds are easy to isolate because most of the words contain only one syllable. The included sound sorting Guidebook shows you how to set up, manage, and assess your sound sorting activities. The comprehensive guide outlines a developmental sequence of sorting activities, from easier rhyming and beginning sound contrasts to more difficult Vowel and consonant digraph discrimination. Kits contain everything you need to set up a multitude of activities: dozens of appealing objects, neatly organized by individual sound, four two-sided sorting mats that allow students to sort two, three, four, and five groups of objects, cards with a target sound and illustration for that sound, and sound sorting Guidebook. Sort objects by 12 different rhymes, such as: bug, Rug, slug, or cake, rake, snake. Includes 50 objects, 4 sorting mats, labels, and sound sorting Guidebook., The comprehensive guide outlines a developmental sequence of sorting activities, from easier rhyming and beginning sound contrasts to more difficult vowel and consonant digraph discrimination, Kits contain everything you need to set up a multitude of activities, Four two-sided sorting mats that allow students to sort two, three, four, and five groups of objects.

input.bullet_points:
BUILDING CONFIDENCE – Kids ages 5+ develop math fluency by snapping cubes together to count, group, and explore patterns in a hands-on, colorful way that makes learning fun.
ENCOURAGES CRITICAL THINKING – Children strengthen problem-solving skills by linking cubes to form shapes, sequences, and equations—ideal for early STEM exploration.
SUPPORTS CLASSROOM LEARNING – Teachers use these cubes to reinforce math concepts like addition, subtraction, and base ten in centers, small groups, or whole-class instruction.
PROMOTES FINE MOTOR SKILLS – Snapping cubes together helps kids refine hand-eye coordination and dexterity while staying engaged through tactile play.
VERSATILE FOR ANY SETTING – Whether at home, in therapy, or in school, this set of 500 cubes in 10 vibrant colors supports learning through play for kids ages 5 and up.
input.description: Snap Cubes by Learning Resources offer a dynamic way for kids to explore math through play. With 500 interlocking cubes in 10 bright colors, children ages 5 and up can build, count, and create patterns that reinforce foundational math skills. These cubes are perfect for small hands and snap together easily, making them ideal for use in classrooms, homeschool setups, or therapy sessions. Educators and parents alike appreciate their versatility—from teaching number sense to supporting visual learning. Whether used for quiet time activities or collaborative learning, Snap Cubes help children develop spatial awareness, logic, and motor skills. Designed with safety in mind, they're not suitable for children under 3 due to small parts. This engaging tool transforms math practice into a creative experience that grows with your child.

input.title: Melissa & Doug Old MacDonald's Farm Song Puzzle – 8-Piece Wooden Peg Puzzle with Light-Activated Sounds, Music Learning Toy for Toddlers and Preschoolers Ages 2+
input.bullet_points:
Sing-Along Farmyard Puzzle – Lift and place each wooden peg piece to hear verses of “Old MacDonald Had a Farm”; farmer starts the song and each animal sings its part; lyrics and instructions included for sing-along fun.
Sing-Along Farmyard Puzzle – Lift and place each wooden peg piece to hear verses of “Old MacDonald Had a Farm”; farmer starts the song and each animal sings its part; lyrics and instructions included for sing-along fun.
Chunky Peg Pieces for Easy Grasp – Extra-thick puzzle pieces with durable pegs are sized just right for toddlers little hands, encouraging fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, and early matching skills.
Auditory & Cognitive Skill Builder – Familiar song and animal sounds support auditory processing, problem-solving, and memory recall through engaging, screen-free educational play.
Ggift-Ready for Toddlers – Makes a thoughtful gift for toddlers and preschoolers ages 2 to 5; a screen-free educational toy ideal for birthdays, holidays, or everyday playtime fun.
input.description:
Product Description

Join Old MacDonald and his friendly barnyard friends as they help each other complete this classic childhood song. Pegs help children two and older easily grasp and manipulate the eight adorably illustrated pieces (farmer, cow, pig, horse, chickens, ducks, dog, and sheep). Lift the beautifully illustrated wooden puzzle pieces to hear Old MacDonald start the song (“Old MacDonald had a farm, E-I-E-I-O!”), and each animal complete its part (for example, the pig sings, “And on that farm he had a pig, E-I-E-I-O [… etc.]”). Directions and lyrics are included on the puzzle so kids can sing along! Two AAA batteries required, not included; sounds are light-activated - for best results, use in bright, direct light.

From the Manufacturer

From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose.

Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!
